- - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Tim, Sounds good, thanks for letting me know. Safe travels,Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/> If you are in the DC area please check out our upcoming networking event! <http://events.r20.constantcontact.com/register/event?oeidk=a07e6cqaqtk0702919f&llr=kp5x6qkab> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Tim Warman [mailto:tim.warman@sem-advisors.com] Sent: Thursday, October 25, 2012 2:47 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Introduction to MBO Hi Sara, Thanks for sending this and the previous email. I am headed out of town for a week. I will get in touch when I return during the week of Nov. 5th. Thanks again, Tim WarmanOn Thu, Oct 25, 2012 at 1:39 PM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Hi Tim, Hope you are doing well. As a courtesy, I wanted to follow up on the email below. Please feel free to schedule a call on my calendar at your convenience by going here going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaEVcs0Z4pfGMJ6XhmifgaZ2l9r15H%2F713d0tl0txf4alUg%3D%3D> you may also reach out to me directly or provide me with your number if you prefer. Looking forward to connecting with you,Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028 <tel:703.793.6028>f: 703.793.6068 <tel:703.793.6068>e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaEVcs0Z4pfGMJ6XhmifgaZ2l9r15H%2F713d0tl0txf4alUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaEVcs0Z4pfGMJ6XhmifgaZ2l9r15H%2F713d0tl0txf4alUg%3D%3D> If you are in the DC area please check out our upcoming networking event! <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://events.r20.constantcontact.com/register/event?oeidk=a07e6cqaqtk0702919f&llr=kp5x6qkab&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaEVcs0Z4pfGMJ6XhmifgaZ2l9r15H%2F713d0tl0txf4alUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. From: Sara Conde Sent: Monday, October 22, 2012 5:10 PM To: 'Stefan Mueller'; Tim Warman Subject: RE: Introduction to MBO Dear Tim , Nice to meet you via email. I’ll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaEVcs0Z4pfGMJ6XhmifgaZ2l9r15H%2F713d0tl0txf4alUg%3D%3D>. You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaEVcs0Z4pfGMJ6XhmifgaZ2l9r15H%2F713d0tl0txf4alUg%3D%3D>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028 <tel:703.793.6028>f: 703.793.6068 <tel:703.793.6068>e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaEVcs0Z4pfGMJ6XhmifgaZ2l9r15H%2F713d0tl0txf4alUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaEVcs0Z4pfGMJ6XhmifgaZ2l9r15H%2F713d0tl0txf4alUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaEVcs0Z4pfGMJ6XhmifgaZ2l9r15H%2F713d0tl0txf4alUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaEVcs0Z4pfGMJ6XhmifgaZ2l9r15H%2F713d0tl0txf4alUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaEVcs0Z4pfGMJ6XhmifgaZ2l9r15H%2F713d0tl0txf4alUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Stefan Mueller [mailto:stefan.mueller@sem-advisors.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:stefan.mueller@sem-advisors.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaEVcs0Z4pfGMJ6XhmifgaZ2l9r15H%2F713d0tl0txf4alUg%3D%3D>] Sent: Monday, October 22, 2012 8:38 AM To: Tim Warman Cc: info; Lindsey Adams Subject: Introduction to MBO Tim, Please find attached an introduction to MBO - most of which, you and I have already discussed. You can expect someone from MBO to reach out to you shortly. Let me know if you have any questions, Stefan-- Stefan Mueller Managing Director SEM Washington, DC Phone (202) 684-8270 ext 801 <tel:%28202%29%20684-8270%20ext%20801> Fax (202) 684-8270 <tel:%28202%29%20684-8270> Email stefan.mueller@SEM-advisors.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:stefan.mueller@SEM-advisors.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaEVcs0Z4pfGMJ6XhmifgaZ2l9r15H%2F713d0tl0txf4alUg%3D%3D&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaEVcs0Z4pfGMJ6XhmifgaZ2l9r15H%2F713d0tl0txf4alUg%3D%3D>
